ing: 2 tablespoons Kikkoman Less Sodium Soy Sauce
4 green onions, thinly sliced (plus extra for garnish)
des: "Soy sauce, sesame oil, green onion, and spices bring incredible flavor to grilled hamburgers."
ins: Combine all ingredients with ground beef* in a bowl and mix well. Shape burger patties and grill burger following your favorite method.
